com.fluidops.iwb
Class IwbStart

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.IwbStart

public class IwbStart
extends java.lang.Object

Main startup of the Information workbench. Provides a main method to start an embedded Jetty server, which starts up the Information Workbench web application and performs the initializations. In addition this class maintains the initialization code that is relevant to the Information Workbench platform and that is executed at startup of the web application via servlet context listeners. *

static void initializeIWBWebapp(java.lang.String j2eeWebPrefix)
          Initialize the Information Workbench webapp: 1) invoke the generic Information Workbench initializaton code via initializeWebapp(String) 2) register RMI endpoint 3) register shutdown hook This method is to be called once at startup of the web application, e.g. in case of the community edition from the IwbServletContextListener that is registered to the webapp

Constructor Detail

IwbStart

public IwbStart()
Method Detail

initializeApp

public static void initializeApp()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Initialize the Information Workbench application: 1) Log4j configuration 2) Jetty startup The actual webapp is initialized by means of servlet context listeners, e.g. IwbServletContextListener. for IWB CE. The listener in turn invokes an initialization method for the webapp, which in case of the community edition is initializeIWBWebapp(String).

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

initializeIWBWebapp

public static void initializeIWBWebapp(java.lang.String j2eeWebPrefix)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Initialize the Information Workbench webapp: 1) invoke the generic Information Workbench initializaton code via initializeWebapp(String) 2) register RMI endpoint 3) register shutdown hook This method is to be called once at startup of the web application, e.g. in case of the community edition from the IwbServletContextListener that is registered to the webapp

Parameters:
j2eeWebPrefix -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

initializeWebapp

public static void initializeWebapp(java.lang.String j2eeWebPrefix)

Generic initialization code for the Information Workbench that is to be executed in all different editions.

addIwbShutdownHook

public static void addIwbShutdownHook()
Registers the IWB shutdown hook

shutdownIwb

public static void shutdownIwb()
Static method performing IWB shutdown, currently both IWB CE and EE. Blocks until all shutdown code has been executed. NOTE: method is invoked via reflection from other projects. do not change signature

bootstrapWiki

public static void bootstrapWiki()
Bootstraps the wiki from a given a bootstrap directory. May be called multiple times for merging multiple wiki bootstrap directories (in the latter case, for duplicate wiki pages the last bootstrap directory page will be used).

bootstrapDB

public static void bootstrapDB()
Load files from dbBootstrap folder into DB.
